snippet.title: Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg | Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
#ww2, #strategy, #strategygames, #wargame, #turnbased #tactics #blitzkrieg #strategicmind 
Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200330/Strategic_Mind_Blitzkrieg/

Welcome the new wargame by Starni Games - Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg. Blitzkrieg is the way!

The wargame fans all around the world will have the opportunity to enjoy the new turn-based strategy about World War II for the German perspective!

The Operation Weserubung, Invasion of France, Battle for Britain, Siege of Tobruk, Operation Barbarossa,  Battle for Moscow, Battle for Stalingrad - all these and many other memorable battles of the World War II in Europe will be presented with historical accuracy in new strategy game Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg. While the UE4 engine provides excellent 3D graphics and realistic battle scenes, made with the photo scans and motion capture usage.

Epic land, aerial and naval battles are awaiting you. You will have various tanks, aircraft, and other units of the time including sturm artillery and even armored trains under your command. You can use both German and trophy tank models such as: Panzer III, Panzer IV, Char B1, Matilda II, Tiger, Tiger II, KV-1, T-34, and others. And that is not all: dozens of land, aerial and naval units will be among your troops. Develop your own strategy, assemble your army, and turn it into a truly efficient war machine!

Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg - is a strategy game, which allows us to see the events of World War II through the eyes of Germany’s top commanders and get a better understanding of the events with the help of around 90 minutes of cinematics and lots of in-operation narrative. Gather your forces and join the battle - the outcome depends on your actions!

Previous games by Starni Games:
Strategic Mind: The Pacific https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific/
Panzer Strategy https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200330/Strategic_Mind_Blitzkrieg/
